item.title: Jeff Bezos’ fiancée Lauren Sánchez is being slammed for her inauguration outfit—igniting Gen Z’s ‘office siren’ debate and what’s appropriate for work
item.description: The “office siren” trend may have normalized the look, and the outfit could reflect a new culture of individualism in Trump’s administration.

item.title: Baton, led by a former Zillow executive, raises $10 million to help small businesses find buyers.
item.description: Baton’s clients include the well-known Brooklyn bakery L'imprimerie

item.title: TikTokers’ panic revealed the lies they used to build careers and get millions of followers before the U.S. blackout: Now they’re backtracking as angry fans blast their fake videos
item.description: The confessions came back to haunt them once TikTok was back online.

item.title: Tax season 2025: Everything you need to know about deadlines, refunds, audits and more
item.description: IRS will begin accepting and processing 2024 returns on Jan. 27.

item.title: Trump’s new memecoin and Trump Media stock are both plunging in a massive post-inauguration sell-off
item.description: Both assets have been accused of their value being disconnected from their financial performance.
